name: A Day In The Park (Otter and Bench)
name_original: A Day In The Park (Otter and Bench)
description:
PHOTOSENSITIVE SEIZURE WARNING: This game contains flashing lights and loud noises which some may find disturbing.

A Day In The Park is a wave-based horror shooter, featuring 6 unique enemies, hundreds of events, and a unique delusional gameplay style. 

Game Footage

If you like this game, please consider supporting us! Let us know if you'd like to see a sequel!
